titleStmt.title: Czech Novel Corpus for the ELTeC

projectDesc.p: This is the Czech Novel Corpus for the ELTeC, the European Literary Text Collection, produced by the COST Action Distant Reading for European Literary History (CA16204, distant-reading.net).
This repository is maintained by the Institute of the Czech National Corpus, Charles University, Prague, ucnk.ff.cuni.cz/en/
